title: Gamification Strategies to Improve Engagement in Engineering Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Engineering Knowledge and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Formative assessment-centered operation utilizing leaderboard-based gamification.

learning_goals: Learners perform learning activities by accessing the LMS at least five times per week through a leaderboard system
Learners achieve learning progress rates of at least 70% compared to peers using gamification elements
Learners demonstrate conceptual understanding by scoring an average of 80+ points on weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
